A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't think this was a particularly great movie because you had to have so much background (as SW fans usually do) in order to get the references and connections to earlier saga\, but to me it was a very good Star Wars movie. I enjoyed watching Luke come to terms with his own guilt and fear\, though I felt Rey's time on the island could have been shortened. And I enjoyed the ways they preserved Leia for the climactic moments. I will see it again and probably more than once.
